full_summary:
### Workplace Transformation Program (WTP) - Workspaces Supply Arrangement

#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

The Government of Canada has a requirement under the Workplace Transformation Program (WTP) for a Supply Arrangement for workspaces. Suppliers are invited to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO).

##### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** WS3647912214-Doc3647943107
* **Issue Date:** 2022-08-31
* **Closing Date:** 2022-10-11T14:00:00
* **Issue Date of Amendment (11):** 2022-10-07

#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this RFSO are as follows:

* **Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contractual Details
This RFSO will be awarded in accordance with the Canada’s Industrial Supply Arrangement (ISA) between the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the preferred supplier.

#### Supply Arrangement (SA) Coverage

The RFSO will cover the following Product Categories:

* Product Category; 
* Product Cat 2; 
* Product Cat 3; 
* Product Cat 5; 
* Product Cat 6
* Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA) products are also included in this RFSO.

#### Notice of Working and Bid

**Important Notice:** Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time has been revised to October 11, 2022. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 EST on October 11, 2022. Bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive.

To view the full notice please click on the following link:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13980877?extsite=MTM5ODA4NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please be sure to find all your relevant information, and while omitting any minor points. The text has been reworded to make it easier and more friendly for the average government doc end-users, once again inviting the end-users to respond.
